description.raw:
When a round is created:

- a simulator instance and a field computer instance are launched

- ssh keys for these instances are created and permissions are set depending on the mode it's in (practice vs competition)

- server vpn keys are generated by posting to the keys server

- the cloudsim.options data will be populated with ssh key url and vpn config settings once all necessary info is available (after ~10seconds when simulator ip is available).

- the round data will be populated with ssh key and instance data

  • the cloudsim.options data will be populated with ssh key url and vpn config settings once all necessary info is available (after ~10seconds when simulator ip is available).

  • the round data will be populated with ssh key and instance data
